data.title: Tesla upgraded to 'market outperform' at JMP Securities
data.text: Tesla shares climbed on Tuesday, after JMP Securities analyst Joseph Osha upgraded the electric vehicle maker to 'market outperform' and setting a street-high price target on the stock to $1,060 per share.

data.title: Tesla's stock jumps again after JMP says recent selloff has provided 'good opportunity' to buy
data.text: Shares of Tesla Inc. TSLA, +11.32% jumped 6.2% in premarket trading Tuesday, adding to the previous session's 11.3% surge, after JMP analyst Jospeh Osha upgraded the electric vehicle company to market outperform from market perform, saying the recent selloff has provided investors with a "good opportunity" to buy.
